keyMoments.description: Don Accino reveals the full extent of his Atsu Atsu no Mi powers to Zoro, demonstrating his ability to generate extreme heat up to 10,000 degrees and melt any substance.
keyMoments.significance: First major demonstration of the Devil Fruit's capabilities in this episode, establishing Don Accino as a formidable threat.

abilities.name: Extreme Heat Generation
abilities.description: The user can produce and control vast amounts of heat, with the maximum temperature reaching 10,000 degrees. Steam emanates from the user's body and they can melt objects through contact.

abilities.name: Temperature Regulation
abilities.description: Enables survival in extreme environments from frozen islands to molten lava. The user can control their body temperature.

abilities.name: Emotional Heat Scaling
abilities.description: Heat intensity scales with the user's emotional state - calm produces manageable warmth while anger generates dangerously high temperatures.

abilities.name: Atsuyaki Tamago
abilities.description: Heat projectiles thrown as long-range attacks, appearing as glowing hot spheres.

abilities.name: Atsu Geshō
abilities.description: Creates a steam whirlwind surrounding opponents.

abilities.name: Net Tire
abilities.description: Rolling attack resembling a heated tire.

abilities.name: Netsuryo Up
abilities.description: Temperature escalation technique with visual transformation, allowing the user to increase heat output to maximum 10,000 degrees.

strengths: Can melt nearly any physical substance
Provides both offensive and defensive capabilities
User is immune to extreme temperatures
Heat-based attacks are difficult to block physically
weaknesses: Uncontrolled anger can make the user dangerous to allies
Heat can be counteracted by sufficient cooling or water-based attacks
trivia: The Atsu Atsu no Mi has a canonical counterpart - Charlotte Oven's Netsu Netsu no Mi, which appears later in the series with similar heat manipulation abilities.
This Devil Fruit is anime-only and does not appear in the One Piece manga.
Don Accino is referred to as a '10,000 Degree Human' when using his powers at maximum capacity.
